name: Santa Rush - Don't slow down
description:
You are Santa. You have been seen. Now you’re on the run!

In “Santa Rush” you need to escape from a sweet-toothed gang of children – but be careful not to trip or you’ll fuel their sugar rush!

FEATURES

- It's FREE!

Oh, and also …

- Optimised for iPhone X , XR and XS
- Easy ONE FINGER controls
- THE Greatest Christmas Track
- high end PIXEL GRAPHICS
- ENDLESS Running / Fun
- RUNNING THE GREAT digital OUTDOORS
- kickstarting the CHRISTMAS-TINGLE
- COMPETING with your co-working Santas FOR THE LONGEST RUN

Merry Christmas!
publishers: We Think Things Play Monaco & Meyer GbR.
